Sentencas: Samples of Sm and Mg co-doped ceria electrolytes of Ce0.8Sm0.2-xMgxO2-delta (x = 0, 0.05, 0.10, 0.15 and 0.20) were sintered from powders obtained by solid-state reaction method.
Titulo: Effect of Sm and Mg co-doping on the properties of ceria-based electrolyte materials for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The structures and electrical properties were characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD) and AC impedance spectroscopy (IS).
Titulo: Effect of Sm and Mg co-doping on the properties of ceria-based electrolyte materials for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The thermal expansion curves of samples were measured and the thermal expansion coefficients between 100 and 800 degrees C were calculated.
Titulo: Effect of Sm and Mg co-doping on the properties of ceria-based electrolyte materials for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Results Showed that co-doping with appropriate ratio of Sm and Mg can improve the electrical performance of ceria-based electrolytes.
Titulo: Effect of Sm and Mg co-doping on the properties of ceria-based electrolyte materials for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: As the substitution amount of Mg for Sm increased up to 50 mol%, the conductivity Of the samples maintained almost unchanged or even slightly higher than that doped only with Sm in intermediate temperature.
Titulo: Effect of Sm and Mg co-doping on the properties of ceria-based electrolyte materials for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The results Suggest that the materials cost for producing the ceria-based intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) may be significantly reduced owing to the cost difference between Mg and Sm. (C) 2008
Titulo: Effect of Sm and Mg co-doping on the properties of ceria-based electrolyte materials for IT-SOFCs
